item.description:
I had fun at the March game night at my house. Let's do this again at the end of April. I've got some good Wii video games that are good for a party, so let's plan on doing that. No previous skill required, of course.

Feel free to bring food and/or drink to share.Â  I'll send my address to anyone who RSVPs "Yes".
item.how_to_find_us: I'll give an address and directions to anyone who RSVPs Yes
item.name: Video Game Night
